hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:There is pre-emption in everything which is shared, be it land, or a dwelling or a garden. It is not proper to sell it until he informs his partner; he may go in for that, or he may abandon it; and it he (the partner intending to sell his share) does not do that, then his partner has the greatest right to it until he permits him
